properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 10 at 3:29AM CST until January 12 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Kansas City/Pleasant HIll MO
properties.description:
...Dangerous Travel Conditions Likely Friday Afternoon through
Saturday...

* WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total snow
accumulations of 3 to 5 inches and ice accumulations of two
tenths to three tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 40
mph.

* WHERE...Schuyler and Adair Counties.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to midnight CST Saturday night.

* IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the
ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. Patchy blowing snow
could significantly reduce visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will drop rapidly after sunset
Friday which could cause a flash freeze of any liquid water on
roads and elevated surfaces in combination with the wintry mix
already falling.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CST SATURDAY NIGHT
